taskGroup.intro: Introduction This cheat sheet is a tutorial for scripting CDK in Bioclipse.
taskGroup.onCompletion:
Conclusion This is a collection of tutorials for scripting CDK in Bioclipse.
Comments and suggestions are welcome to <ola.spjuth(AT)farmbio.uu.se>

task.name: Scripting basics
task.intro:
Introduction
This tutorial demonstrates the basics of scripting in Bioclipse.
task.onCompletion:
Conclusion
Scripting in Bioclipse is easy. Its is very powerful to combine Javascript and Managers which enables creation of advanced scripts.

task.name: Basic I/O
task.intro:
Introduction
This cheat sheet demonstrates basic I/O using CDK in Bioclipse.
task.onCompletion:
Conclusion
CDK I/O in Bioclipse is straightforward and powerful, and forms the basis of more advanced scripting.

task.name: Editing and running scripts
task.intro:
Introduction
This tutorial demonsrates how to edit and run scripts in Bioclipse, as well as how to download Gists.
task.onCompletion:
Conclusion
Editing and running scripts is easy in Bioclipse. To publish scripts as Gists makes them available for other users, and provides means to easily update a new version of a script.

task.name: Sample CDK scripts
task.intro:
Introduction
This tutorial downloads, opens, and runs some script to demonstrate CDK functionality in Bioclipse.
task.onCompletion:
Conclusion
It is very powerful to script CDK from Bioclipse. These scripts is just a taste of what is possible!
